author: jstrachan
msg: added Cocoon JellyTransformer as a new to do item

author: jstrachan
msg: Added example of using a Maven style local project build and then a global (Maven) build, allowing callbacks to be defined locally in a projects jelly script while still using the global build options.

Once we move to lazily creating Goal objects and attaching Action objects to the goals in the GoalTag, then we can move most of this stuff into the Maven.jelly and just define the callbacks first, then include Maven to do the rest.

author: jstrachan
msg: patched the Project finder methods to use JellyContext.findVariable() to handle nested Jelly files easier

author: jstrachan
msg: Minor patch to the <project> tag so that a project could define its own <project> and import the Maven project which also contains a <project> and both will share the same underlying Werkz Project

author: jstrachan
msg: removed unnecessary dependency on log4j which is no longer needed (now werkz isn't using it directly)
